ygData.subject: Re: Runes
ygData.msgSnippet: There is no specific monster that carries any rune with a given frequency.  Unfortunately, I am under the impression its just a game of chance.  I have gotten
ygData.messageBody:
There is no specific monster that carries any rune with a given
frequency. Unfortunately, I am under the impression its just a game of
chance. I have gotten lots of "words" in oasis off the dw crocs, BUT, I
haven't seen a rune there yet. There were people acquiring runes in
lavastorm, but its all up to chance from what I can see. I hope someone
else has a better answer out there than I do.


At 07:51 PM 6/7/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: Alex Cordero <gemini5719@...>
>
>
>Does anyone know a website where it says where to find runes or which
>monsters have specific runes because i'm approaching 16 and i haven't seen
>a rune in the game yet. And plz don't copy that thing that says it spawns
>on magical creatures and some number or people will have runes that don't
>pertain to thier class. Thanks for the assist
>
